metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Similar to Bluey and Doc McStuffins, it focuses on social-emotional learning and everyday childhood experiences with gentle lessons.

metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Like The Magic School Bus, it's an educational animated series that explores the animal kingdom with engaging adventures.

metas.name: Super Why!
metas.description: Shares the educational and literacy focus of Peg + Cat and WordGirl, with interactive problem-solving.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: A hands-on educational show akin to Ada Twist, Scientist and The Magic School Bus, encouraging curiosity about science.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A beautifully animated show with a gentle pace, similar to the calming nature of Clifford the Big Red Dog and Bluey, focusing on exploration and discovery.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: An animated series that promotes literacy and cultural understanding, fitting with the educational and family-friendly aspects of shows like WordGirl and Curious George.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: Similar to Numberblocks and Ada Twist, Scientist, this show answers kids' big questions about how things work in a fun, animated way.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A charming and educational animated series with a focus on nature, similar to the calming and observational elements of Clifford the Big Red Dog and Curious George.

metas.name: Hilda
metas.description: While it has fantasy elements like The Magic School Bus, Hilda is a visually stunning and adventurous series with a strong female lead, suitable for older kids who enjoy animation.

metas.name: The Octonauts
metas.description: An underwater adventure series that teaches about marine life, similar to the educational exploration of Wild Kratts and The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Trash Truck
metas.description: A gentle and heartwarming animated series about friendship and imagination, echoing the spirit of Bluey and Curious George.

metas.name: Go, Dog. Go!
metas.description: A fun and energetic animated series with a focus on vehicles and problem-solving, reminiscent of the playful nature of Peg + Cat and Special Agent Oso.

metas.name: Rhyme Time Town
metas.description: An animated show that incorporates music and rhymes to teach early literacy skills, similar to Peg + Cat and Super Why!.

metas.name: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
metas.description: A vibrant and imaginative animated series with a focus on friendship and overcoming differences, suitable for older children who enjoyed the adventurous aspects of WordGirl and The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: A charming animated series based on popular children's books, focusing on cause and effect and imaginative play, similar to Curious George and Bluey.

metas.name: Esme & Roy
metas.description: A gentle animated show about imaginative play and problem-solving, fitting the themes of shows like Doc McStuffins and Bluey.

metas.name: Alma's Way
metas.description: An animated series that celebrates culture and community, with problem-solving elements that resonate with shows like Ada Twist, Scientist and Molly of Denali.

metas.name: Puppy Dog Pals
metas.description: A fun and energetic animated series about two puppy brothers and their adventures, similar to the lighthearted feel of Clifford the Big Red Dog and Special Agent Oso.

metas.name: Costume Quest
metas.description: A lighthearted animated series about kids on a Halloween adventure, with themes of bravery and friendship, akin to the adventurous spirit of WordGirl.

metas.name: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
metas.description: A humorous and family-friendly animated series with a lot of heart, similar to the comedic elements of Bluey and Ada Twist, Scientist.

metas.name: Mira, Royal Detective
metas.description: An animated mystery series set in India, with a strong female lead who solves problems, echoing the spirit of WordGirl and Special Agent Oso.

metas.name: Rainbow Rangers
metas.description: An animated series about a team of girls who protect nature, blending action and environmental themes, fitting for fans of WordGirl and Wild Kratts.

metas.name: Chop Chop Ninja
metas.description: A fun animated series about young ninjas learning about teamwork and friendship, with action that's appropriate for kids, similar to WordGirl.

metas.name: Pinky Malinky
metas.description: A lighthearted and humorous animated show about a hot dog who navigates life with his friends, similar to the quirky comedy of Bluey.

metas.name: Lilybuds
metas.description: A gentle and visually appealing animated series about nature and friendship, similar to the calming feel of Tumble Leaf and Puffin Rock.

metas.name: Big City Greens
metas.description: A family sitcom with animated elements that follows a family adapting to city life, offering humor and relatable situations similar to Bluey.

metas.name: Dinotrux
metas.description: A fun animated series that combines dinosaurs and construction vehicles, appealing to a sense of adventure and mechanical interest, like The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Gabby's Dollhouse
metas.description: A hybrid live-action and animated series that encourages imaginative play and problem-solving, akin to Doc McStuffins and Bluey.

metas.name: The Snoopy Show
metas.description: A charming animated series featuring beloved Peanuts characters and their everyday adventures, with a gentle humor suitable for families.

metas.name: Pocoyo
metas.description: A simple yet engaging animated series that uses clear language and visual cues to teach basic concepts, similar to the educational focus of Peg + Cat and Numberblocks.

metas.name: True and the Rainbow Kingdom
metas.description: An animated series that focuses on problem-solving and emotional intelligence with magical elements, fitting for fans of Ada Twist, Scientist and Doc McStuffins.

metas.name: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
metas.description: A humorous and action-packed animated series based on popular books, offering fun adventures similar to WordGirl.

metas.name: Spirit Riding Free
metas.description: A beautiful animated series about friendship, adventure, and horses, with positive messages for young viewers, resonating with the spirit of Curious George and Clifford the Big Red Dog.

metas.name: Waffles + Mochi
metas.description: A live-action and animated series that combines food, travel, and learning, offering an educational and fun experience similar to Ada Twist, Scientist.

metas.name: PJ Masks
metas.description: An animated superhero series for preschoolers that focuses on teamwork and problem-solving, similar to the action and adventure of WordGirl and Special Agent Oso.
